entry.title: Re: Safer sighashes and more granular SIGHASH_NOINPUT
entry.summary: In an effort to clarify a misconception, it's important to note a correction regarding the use of `sighash_single` and its distinction from `sighash_single|sighash_anyonecanpay`. This rectification comes after a private discussion where the differences between the two were highlighted. The initial confusion stemmed from conflating these two concepts, which serve distinct functions within their respective contexts. Acknowledging this mistake is crucial to prevent any further misinformation and to maintain the accuracy of discussions surrounding the topic. This interaction underscores the value of open dialogue and the willingness to correct misunderstandings in a constructive manner.
